title: how i can speak with riot support?
body: if i have new idea about LOL or i want cooperate with LOL how i should act?

replies.body: Support can assist with in-game issues, but are not part of the development team.  If you have any ideas or feedback you'd like to provide, please share it with the community and let your voice be heard.  I recommend sharing that in a post through our [Gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.  Good luck!
